mapper.select: select count(order_date) as orderdate from tb_order where date_format(order_date,"%Y-%m-%d") >= date_add(curdate(), interval -1 day) union all select count(*) from tb_refund where refund_confirm_cd = 0 union all select count(*) as noanswer from tb_inquiry where answer_cd = 0 union all select count(*) as waiting from tb_shipping where ship_cd = 'waiting' union all select count(*) as nopur from tb_purchase where purchase_cd = 0 union all select count(*) as notaprrove from tb_userinfo where approval_cd = 'n'
select pro_no,sum(order_qty) as order_qty from tb_order group by pro_no;
